The claim originated from an image share: which included text suggesting that Polysorbate 80 in vaccines can cause anaphylactic shock, encephalitis, and infertility.
The image was associated with Natural Ne: a website known for hosting health disinformation.
Social media posts featuring the claim c: 19 vaccines were approved for emergency use.
The US Food and Drug Administration conf: BioNTech nor Moderna Covid-19 vaccines contain Polysorbate 80, contradicting the claim made in the image.
